name: Attuned_Avalanche_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a chance to boost your status protection against hold, disorient, sleep, immobilize, confuse and terrorize effects for a short time, and reduces the power's recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement's chance to trigger is equal to approximately 3 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power.
